scripts.translations:suggest-from-pt-br: unified-translations --translations-file ./src/locales/translations.json --languages pt-br=./src/locales/pt_br.json,en-us=./src/locales/en_us.json,es=./src/locales/es.json --mode build --suggest "pt-br:pt>en-us:en" && unified-translations --translations-file ./src/locales/translations.json --languages pt-br=./src/locales/pt_br.json,en-us=./src/locales/en_us.json,es=./src/locales/es.json --mode reverse && unified-translations --translations-file ./src/locales/translations.json --languages pt-br=./src/locales/pt_br.json,en-us=./src/locales/en_us.json,es=./src/locales/es.json --mode build --suggest "pt-br:pt>es" && unified-translations --translations-file ./src/locales/translations.json --languages pt-br=./src/locales/pt_br.json,en-us=./src/locales/en_us.json,es=./src/locales/es.json --mode reverse
